CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 8, 1958, page A4, reads: "Presenting Gavel - During the 24th annual solidarity sessions of the Harriet Tubman Guild, Inc., at Jerusalem Baptist Church recently, Mrs. Preston Clayton, left, the retiring president, presented the gavel to the newly elected head, Mrs. Iona Richardson. Others in picture are the Rev. G. Linwood Fauntleroy, guest soloist, and the Rev. G. A. Fitch, who installed the officers. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Preston Clayton handing gavel to Iona Richardson, with Rev. G. Linwood Fauntleroy and Rev. G. A. Fitch looking on, in Jerusalem Baptist Church, another version
